snippet: The Steelers and quarterback Ben Roethlisberger have agreed on a contract extension that will keep him with the team beyond his 12th N.F.L. season, the team announced on Twitter without giving details.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers sign quarterback Ben Roethlisberger to contract extension.
lead_paragraph: The Steelers and quarterback Ben Roethlisberger have agreed on a contract extension that will keep him with the team beyond his 12th N.F.L. season, the team announced on Twitter without giving details.
